Sentencas: A series of four compounds (LaMnO3, La0.70Sr0.30MnO3-delta, La0.80Sr0.20FeO3-delta and La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.50Mn0.50O3-delta of interest as electrode materials in intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells have been prepared using a carbonate co-precipitation route in aqueous medium.
Titulo: Co-precipitation synthesis of SOFC electrode materials

Sentencas: LaMnO3, La0.70Sr0.30MnO3-delta, and La0.75Sr0.25Cr0.50Mn0.50O3-delta have been obtained as a pure phase, while La0.80Sr0.20FeO3-delta retained an impurity phase; fine microstructures with sub-micron sized particles can be obtained in all cases at the proper calcinations temperature, except for LaMnO3.
Titulo: Co-precipitation synthesis of SOFC electrode materials

Sentencas: The precipitation yield of the single metal ions have been experimentally determined in the mother liquors and in the final powders; the results have been evaluated also in comparison with expected yields calculated from thermodynamics of the precipitation process using the software Medusa.
Titulo: Co-precipitation synthesis of SOFC electrode materials

Sentencas: pH higher than 7.5 are suggested to avoid ion losses for all cations.
Titulo: Co-precipitation synthesis of SOFC electrode materials

Sentencas: Structural and microstructural properties and TPO/TPR behaviour suggest that materials prepared via co-precipitation, especially LSCM, could be suited as electrode materials in solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Co-precipitation synthesis of SOFC electrode materials
